fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Roleblock someone each night, deceptively telling them to "listen" and then not saying anything. The next person they visit will also be roleblocked.
- Redirect someone each night, deceptively telling them the person they're visiting is a corpse. The next person they visit will be redirected to you, because word of your lies spread around quick. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Roleblock immune.
- You can use multiple abilities (you're great at multitasking), but may only use one ability each per night (you suck at multitasking).

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see no kills occur on any given night. You can't win on Night 1.
